resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104608</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104608</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085925</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Alternative discussion formats: a public relations campaign</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alternative Diskussion Formate: eine 
Öffentlichkeitsarbeitkampagne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formats alternatifs de discussion : une 
campagne de relations publiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formatos alternativos da discussão: uma 
campanha das relações públicas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formati alternativi di discussione: una 
campagna di pubbliche relazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εναλλακτικές μορφές συζήτησης: μια εκστρατεία 
δημόσιων σχέσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formatos alternativos de la discusión: una 
campaña de las relaciones públicas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">By creating a PR campaign for a historical or literary figure, students can practice a wide range of thinking skills.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Indem sie eine Fotorezeptor Kampagne für eine 
historische oder literarische Abbildung erstellen, können 
Kursteilnehmer eine breite Strecke der denkenden Fähigkeiten üben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En créant une campagne de P.R. pour une figure 
historique ou littéraire, les étudiants peuvent pratiquer un 
éventail de qualifications de pensée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Criando uma campanha do fotorreceptor para uma 
figura histórica ou literária, os estudantes podem praticar uma 
escala larga de habilidades pensando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Creando una campagna del fotoricettore per una 
figura storica o letteraria, gli allievi possono esercitarsi in una 
vasta gamma delle abilità pensanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Με τη δημιουργία μιας εκστρατείας δημόσιων σχέσεων για
έναν ιστορικό ή λογοτεχνικό αριθμό, οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να 
ασκήσουν ένα ευρύ φάσμα των δεξιοτήτων σκέψης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Creando una campaña de la banda para una figura 
histórica o literaria, los estudiantes pueden practicar una amplia 
gama de habilidades de pensamiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104608</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/alternative-discussion-formats-a-public-relations-campaign</uri>
